doc.seg: Dan Da Ra - Kang Seong- Jin
Why are they attacking the gas station ?
Let 's go rob the gas station again .
Why the hell did you call him ?
None of your damn business who 's eating it all !
You trying to piss me off ?
I thought I told you not to do anything stupid !
I thought you were Number One .
You just fucked up everything , didn 't you ?
The Russians put that Sputnik into outer space .
The Dodgers played their last game at Ebbets Field ... and said goodbye to Brooklyn .
That guy , he shot Frank Costello in the head and missed .
The Gallo brothers whacked Albert Anastasia in that barbershop .
With Anastasia out , Vito Genovese figures he 's the big boss .
But Carlo Gambino ... and Joe Bananas had other ideas .
It was the first time the whole Commission would meet face to face .
Bosses and wiseguys were coming from all over the country ... and all the New York families too .
Maybe 50 bosses , the whole wiseguy world ... all coming to this little town upstate .
My father went with Dom Manetta and Tommy D. Fat Tommy .
He was running the family then .
Some asshole thought it would be a good idea to have this meeting ... at Joe Barbara 's farm , up in the country , nice and quiet .
Want to be a fucking rib eye ?
Turns out the cops were watching Joe Barbara like a hawk ... and some deputy sheriff notices all the traffic and calls the feds .
The meeting never even got started .
The feds moved in ... and bingo , the bosses , they moved out .
My father and Dominic , they hid out in the field with some hay or corn .
Dominic bullshits him while my father holds out ... this . 44 cannon he used to carry , and hijacked the tractor .
The story is they drove it to Bensonhurst ... but my father told me they only got as far as Poughkeepsie .
Anyway , Carlo Gambino came out of it ... capo di tutti capi , " boss of all bosses " ... and that was the last time the Commission tried to meet , until now .
What do we gotta meet for ?
Let everybody else worry about their own business .
The '57 meeting was about how we were gonna divide this country .
This meeting is how we 're gonna survive .
You got made guys informing for the feds .
People are getting whacked without permission .
And on top of everything else ... you got these Chinese ... and these crazy Russians to deal with .
We gotta change with the times .
We gonna get a fucking Website ?
When your papa died ... I made him a promise that I 'd always look out for you .
THlS FlLM IS BASED ON ACTUAL EVENTS
Hanne , can 't you use a plate ?
What time have you got there ?
I never seem to get that right .
- I was supposed to meet this dentist - - in California , but all of a sudden , without a warning , they sent me here .
I didn 't even have a chance to change .
And now the guy that I 'm meeting won 't be here until twelve o 'clock . Are you sure about the time ?
Oh yes , it 's a quarter past ten .
So you 're meeting an old friend or what ? No , he doesn 't know that I 'm here .
In fact , he doesn 't even know me .
Arvid Blixen . Do you know him ?
But I 'll bet you 're wondering why I 'm here to meet him .
Arvid , I was going to buy pants for that money .
- But you can 't just waste our 800 kroner !
I 'm fed up with you , Arvid .
Do you think you 're Gandhi or something ?
Hanne , can 't we just have our breakfast in peace ?
Arvid , I think you must be the most boring man in the world .
Do I have " fraud " written on my forehead ?
Preben , we can 't just lend you 25000 without any security .
But you make a living from lending money .
- You weren 't supposed to relieve me .
I know , but I felt like taking a shift .
Morpheus believes he is the One .
It doesn 't matter what I believe .
Are you sure this line is clean ?
Lieutenant , you were given specific orders .
You give me that " juris- my- dick- tion " crap , you can cram it up your ass .
The orders were for your protection .
I think we can handle one little girl .
No , Lieutenant , your men are already dead .
. Morpheus , the line was traced . I don 't know how .
